remarks: Expand definition of a domain.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
isdomn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isdomn.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isdomn.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
isdomn $p |- ( R e. Domn <-> ( R e. NzRing /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( ( x .x. y ) = .0. -> ( x = .0. \/ y = .0. ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
